titleStmt.title: Apostolike obedience. Shewing the duty of subiects to pay tribute and taxes to their princes, according to the word of God, in the law and the Gospell, and the rules of religion, and cases of conscience; determined by the ancient fathers, and the best moderne divines; yea even by those neoterickes who in some other things, put too strict limits to regalitie. A sermon preached at Northampton, at the assises, for the countie, Feb. 22. 1626. / By Robert Sybthorpe Doctor in Divinity, vicar of Brackley..
titleStmt.author: Sybthorpe, Robert, d. 1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Miles Flesher for R.M. and are to be sold by Iames Bowler.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library.
Includes bibliographical references in marginal notes.
